## Summary of primary business of our Company

We are a manufacturer of capital goods and a provider of system integration solutions, specializing in the power transmission and distribution industry for both domestic and international markets. We manufacture and supply a wide range of overhead conductors, power cables supply and solutions, optical ground wire, and provide master system integration services. We supply our products to domestic and global utilities, renewables and transmission developers, metro projects and industrial sector comprising data centers, steel, oil and gas, and cement. We have served customers in over 70 countries, including USA, Brazil, Sweden, South Africa, Egypt, UAE, Chile, Peru from April 1, 2022, to March 31, 2025.
For further information, see “Our Business” on page 222.
## Summary of the industry in which our Company operates

The power sector is expanding rapidly through rising generation capacity, ambitious renewable energy targets and an increasingly interconnected grid. This surge in electricity demand has propelled the electrical power cables and conductors industry. In Fiscal 2025, the Indian market size of conductors reached ₹185 billion and is expected to grow at a CAGR of approximately 5-6% from Fiscal 2025-2030 to reach ₹230-250 billion by Fiscal 2029. In Fiscal 2025, the India's cables and wire market was valued at approximately ₹1,951 billion and is expected to grow at a CAGR of 11-13% between Fiscal 2025-2030 to reach ₹3,350-3,550 billion by Fiscal 2030.
For further information, see “Industry Overview” on page 146.
Anil Agarwal and Twin Star Overseas Limited are the promoters of our Company.
For details, see “Our Promoters and Promoter Group” on page 279.
